objects.text:
• 16.3MP X-Trans CMOS II Sensor
• Advanced 77-Point Autofocus
• Built-in Electronic Viewfinder
• Full HD 1080p Video Recording

product_details.name: Fujifilm X-T10 Mirrorless Digital Camera - Professional Photography Made Accessible
product_details.description:
• Classic retro-styled compact mirrorless camera design
• High-performance 16.3MP X-Trans CMOS II APS-C sensor
• Advanced autofocus system with 77 selectable AF points
• Built-in electronic viewfinder (EVF) with 2.36M-dot resolution
• Tiltable 3.0-inch LCD screen for versatile shooting angles
• Real-time shooting controls with dedicated dials for shutter speed, exposure, and more
• Compatible with Fujifilm's renowned X-mount lens system
• Full HD 1080p video recording capabilities
• Built-in Wi-Fi for easy photo sharing and remote control
• Compact and lightweight body perfect for travel photography
• Film simulation modes to recreate classic Fujifilm styles
• Fast continuous shooting up to 8.0 fps
• Weather-sealed metal body construction

banner_details:
The banner has a bold, high-contrast layout with a dark, grid-style background featuring quadrant color blocks in shades of grey. A product image is placed prominently on the right side, angled to add dimension. The top-left houses a strong, uppercase heading and subheading using a clean, bold typeface (`heading`, `subheading`). Below that, a red-accented tagline (`tagline`) categorizes the product type. A feature list (`description`) is neatly aligned vertically toward the lower-left for product selling points. Price information (`price`) stands out in large white type, followed by a bright rectangular call-to-action button (`cta_background`, `cta`) reading "SHOP NOW." 

**Color Palette:**
- Background: #222222, #1A1A1A, #2C2C2C, #333333, #262626
- Text: #FFFFFF (white), #FF3333 (bright red)
- CTA Button: Red (#FF3333)
product_color: The product image of the Fujifilm X-T10 camera features a sleek and professional aesthetic, achieved through a dominant matte black base color (#1A1A1A) that exudes sophistication. Accents of metallic silver (#C0C0C0) highlight engraved text and control dials, adding a sense of precision and craft. Pops of white (#FFFFFF) on the "FUJIFILM" and "X-T10" labels offer sharp contrast, enhancing readability and brand visibility. Vibrant elements like subtle red (#FF3B30) and yellow-orange (#FFA500) markings on the lens ring draw visual interest. For advertising design, a color palette including black, dark gray (#2E2E2E), white, silver, red, and orange will capture the product's premium, tech-forward feel.
